participant_1.background:
I celebrated my birthday with a small party and a trip to the dog park with my French bulldog.
I take long walks in the park to clear my head and relax.
I don't dye my hair.
i have braces.
I'm not really concerned with my appearance, I'm much more interested in creating and expressing myself.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy riding horses, but I need to be more mindful of my surroundings when I do so.
I love taking my pug Corky to the dog park.
i love all sorts of fresh vegetables.
i hate to lose.
i have one little boy named owen.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
What is your name?
My name is Sarah! What's yours?
My name is Hannah! Nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the dog park with my French bulldog, and I take long walks in the park to clear my head and relax.
That's awesome! I love taking my pug Corky to the dog park too! What's your dog's name?
My dog's name is Milo! He's a really sweet boy.
Milo sounds like a great name for a dog! I'm sure he's really cute.
Thanks! He is!
What else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to create art and express myself creatively. I don't really care what I look like, I just like to create.
That's awesome! I love to create art too! I'm not really concerned with my appearance either, I just like to express myself.
That's great! It's nice to meet someone who shares the same interests as me.
Me too! We should definitely hang out sometime and go to the dog park together.
That would be fun! I'd love to meet your son, Owen.
Yeah, he's a really great kid. I'm sure you two would get along.
I'm sure we would too!
Great! We should definitely make plans to meet up soon.
Sounds good! I'll text you my number.
Sounds good! I'll see you soon
